Staying ahead of industry trends and emerging technologies is crucial in this role. Your technical curiosity will drive innovation and improvement within the team. You will also maintain regular communication with the Team Manager, quickly acquire knowledge of our systems and processes, and build strong working relationships with both IT and non-IT stakeholders within the company.
If you are passionate about software development, eager to mentor others, and excited to work in an Agile environment, we would love to hear from you.

You will design and implement experiments to guide product decisions, including A/B testing, analysis, and recommendations.

listJob.name: Senior Automation QA Engineer
listJob.location: Ho Chi Minh City, Quận 1, TP Hồ Chí Minh
listJob.description:
Company Description
Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier, and more sustainable. From the food you eat, to the water you drink, to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins laboratories work with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic, and labelling is accurate. Eurofins is dedicated to delivering testing services that contribute to the health and safety of society and the planet, and to its corporate responsibility to protect the environment and ensure diversity, equity, and inclusion across the entire network of Eurofins companies.
Job Description
As an Automation Test Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of enterprise applications through automation testing. Your role will involve developing and maintaining automated test scripts, integrating with test management tools, and conducting thorough reviews of test cases. You will work closely with other team members to identify and resolve defects, performing root cause analysis and improving defect management processes. Your focus will be on large-scale applications that include various front-end technologies such as WPF, web-based interfaces, and backend components, including databases, web services, and messaging systems.
In this position, you will apply your expertise in C# and object-oriented programming to build and optimise automation frameworks. You will be involved in testing web services and REST APIs, utilising tools like Selenium, XUnit, and Postman. Additionally, you will work with service testing tools such as Fiddler, SOAP UI, and JSON Lint to ensure comprehensive test coverage. Your role will require close collaboration within an Agile development environment, contributing to the overall quality of software releases and improving automation strategies over time.
listJob.jobExperience:
To succeed in this role, you should have 7 years of experience in automation testing with strong coding skills in C#. A solid understanding of software quality assurance methodologies and experience with test automation for enterprise applications is essential. You should be proficient in testing web services and REST APIs, as well as working with automation frameworks like Coded UI, Selenium, and XUnit. Hands-on experience with database queries and SOA testing principles will be beneficial.
Your ability to work in an Agile development environment, communicate effectively, and collaborate with international teams will be crucial. You should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, along with the ability to quickly adapt to complex systems. Prior exposure to performance and load testing, as well as experience in large system integration projects, will be an advantage. A degree in Computer Science, MCA, or an equivalent qualification is required. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, proactive, and capable of handling multiple tasks while maintaining high quality standards.

listJob.name: Tech Lead - Enterprise AI product engineering
listJob.location: 92A Nguyen Huu Canh St., Ward 22, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP Hồ Chí Minh
listJob.description:
VireoHealth is a US-based publicly-listed (CSE:VREO) 1B+ valuation company with 400M+ in annual revenues as one of the leaders in the medical cannabis space. We are scaling our delivery, e-commerce and internal-facing AI platforms. Despite our size, we have a startup culture (small teams) and you will report to C-level executive with multiple startup exits. Our goal is to establish ourselves as the top 1-2 company in each state we operate in and we see delivery, analytics and an AI-first organization as critical to this mission.
 About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Lead to drive the development of AI-powered solutions and products within the enterprise. This role is ideal for someone with a strong background in product engineering, large language models (LLMs), enterprise integrations, and a passion for quickly launching, testing, and iterating AI-driven products for internal enterprise use cases. The successful candidate will work closely with stakeholders to develop AI-driven customer experiences, internal data analytics platform, prediction models and workflow automation.
 Key Responsibilities
Rapidly design & launch AI Solutions and prototypes: Rapidly iterate and prototype internal AI deployments for a company to drive up to $30M in value, including customer service tools, internal analytics, and AI-driven workflows. 
Enterprise Integration: Integrate AI solutions with enterprise databases and internal data sources, ensuring seamless and secure access. 
AI Model Implementation: Some understanding of fine-tuning LLMs for various enterprise applications, leveraging retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and data pipelines. 
Product Development & Rapid Iteration: Quickly prototype and test AI solutions, refining them based on user feedback and business needs. 
Data Pipeline & Infrastructure: Build and maintain data pipelines to support AI-driven insights and decision-making tools. 
Best Practices & Innovation: Stay up-to-date with the latest AI/ML products and advancements to continuously explore internal AI products that might be relevant to the business
listJob.jobExperience:
7-9 years of experience in full stack software engineering, with a strong focus on product development and enterprise software. 
Experience in LLM-based product engineering, including fine-tuning, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and developing products leveraging AI.
Ability to quickly prototype, test, and iterate solutions and products
Experience with Python, TypeScript/JavaScript, and frameworks such as FastAPI, or LangChain. 
Experience with enterprise data integration, including working with databases like PostgreSQL, Snowflake, or Elasticsearch. 
Strong understanding of data pipelines, and ETL workflows
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes). 
Strong problem-solving skills, AI-first thinking and the ability to understand complex business challenges and translate them into AI-driven solutions - experience using AI for coding.
Excellent communication and leadership skills, in English, with the ability to collaborate across technical and non-technical teams.
listJob.privilege:
Opportunity to lead AI product development and work on cutting-edge enterprise AI solutions that will be adopted immediately
Fast-paced, innovative environment where you can rapidly build, test, and iterate on AI-powered products in a profitable growing company 
Build from zero to one
Work with a highly motivated and experienced team committed to leveraging AI for enterprise innovation. 
Competitive salary and benefits package. 
If you are passionate about AI product engineering and want to drive AI adoption within an enterprise, we’d love to hear from you!

listJob.name: Middle/Senior Business Analyst
listJob.location: Tầng 15, tòa nhà MB – 21 Cát Linh, phường Cát Linh, Quận Đống Đa, Hà Nội
listJob.description:
The Business Analysts ensure that business needs are accurately captured, analyzed, and translated into actionable solutions. 
1, Business Requirements and Solution Development: 
Utilize in-depth knowledge of life insurance, finance, and the current system functionalities to define business problems and requirements. 
Collaborate effectively with business users and IT teams to recommend suitable solutions. 
Take ownership of developing comprehensive Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Business Solution Documents (BSD), Software requirements specifications (SRS), and User stories to ensure End-to-end business processes and detail for required applications. 
2, Research and Analysis: 
Conduct thorough research, solution analysis, and fit-gap analysis between business requirements and current IT system functionalities. 
Identify and recommend practical solutions for system implementation and document the impact analysis from both business and functional perspectives. 
3, Quality Assurance and Testing Support: 
Assist the QA team in developing detailed test plans,and  test scenarios 
Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure successful User Acceptance Testing (UAT), including identifying issues and ensuring resolution before deployment. 
4, User Training and Support: 
Provide on-site training for users, focusing on the fundamental components of the system. 
Offer ongoing support for daily operations and application usage, including troubleshooting, root-cause analysis, and addressing user queries. 
5, Project and Stakeholder Management: 
Act as a liaison between business and technical teams, ensuring alignment of goals and priorities, and identifying opportunities and process improvements by leveraging data to drive business solutions. 
Participate in project planning, status reporting, and change management processes to ensure successful implementation of business initiatives.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business, Economics - Finance, or equivalent. 
Minimum of 3 years of experience in a Business Analyst role or equivalent position 
Experience with Waterfall and agile software development methodologies. 
Experience in using Jira and Confluence for managing requirements and projects 
Experience in using suitable tools/languages for business modeling, and technical diagrams (Figma, Visio, BPMN,…)

Ngoài chế độ lương cạnh tranh, nhân viên PG Bank còn được hưởng rất nhiều chế độ phụ cấp khác theo đặc thù công việc như phụ cấp điện thoại, phụ cấp ăn trưa, phụ cấp đi lại ... , chế độ tham quan nghỉ mát hàng năm, tặng quà cho CBNV nhân dịp sinh nhật, thăm hỏi ốm đau, kết hôn, hỗ trợ thai sản.
▪ Chế độ khen thưởng:
PG Bank có chế độ đãi ngộ nhân viên xứng đáng với năng lực và đóng góp của từng cá nhân. Về cơ bản, PG Bank có chế độ thưởng như sau:
+ Thưởng theo kết quả kinh doanh
+ Thưởng hoàn thành công việc
+ Thưởng cho tập thể, cá nhân tiêu biểu trong năm
+ Thưởng đột xuất cho tập thể, cá nhân hoàn thành xuất sắc nhiệm vụ, có sáng kiến, đóng góp có giá trị cho Ngân hàng, thưởng do hoàn thành vượt mức kế hoạch được giao.
+ Thưởng cho toàn bộ CBNV ngân hàng trong các dịp lễ tết.

Tất cả nhân viên chính thức của PG Bank đều được tham gia Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế và bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo đúng quy định của Luật lao động hiện hành. Ngoài ra, tất cả nhân viên chính thức của PG Bank đều được mua thêm bảo hiểm Pijico, một gói bảo hiểm rất ưu việt giúp thanh toán các chi phí y tế như tiền thuốc, tiền viện phí… khi khám chữa bệnh tại các bệnh viện tốt nhất tại địa phương.

Với mục tiêu xây dựng nguồn nhân lực có năng lực và tính chuyên nghiệp cao đáp ứng chiến lược phát triển nhanh và bền vững của Ngân hàng, chuẩn bị nhân sự kế nhiệm cấp điều hành cho Ngân hàng, PG Bank thường xuyên tổ chức cho nhân viên tham dự các khóa đào tạo trong và ngoài nước, các khóa đào tạo của NHNN, Hiệp hội ngân hàng, các tổ chức đào tạo có uy tín khác nhằm nâng cao trình độ chuyên môn, nâng cao kỹ năng làm việc hiệu quả và các kỹ năng quản lý, lãnh đạo trong từng giai đoạn, vị trí công tác.

Tại PG Bank, nhân viên được làm việc trong môi trường cạnh tranh lành mạnh, rất nhiều cơ hội phát triển, thăng tiến đang chờ đón các bạn.

Develop and verify the automated test cases on our existing software .
Work in an Agile software development environment (using Scrum), participate in meetings and collaborate with stack holders to ensure the quality of products

Experience with Angular and Docker and HTML

Experience Working with machine controllers, OPC UA

We are an industry-leading engineering software company focused on delivering cutting-edge digital plant solutions.  We are now developing an 2D/3D Web Viewer that leverages SVG and 3D files.

### **Job Summary**
We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to lead the implementation of our 2D/3D Viewer. This role involves developing a robust, interactive web application that renders SVG-based diagrams, displays dynamic property data fetched via RESTful APIs. The ideal candidate is passionate about web technologies, has a keen eye for design, and is experienced in creating scalable, high-performance applications. In addition, you must be adept at leveraging modern AI tools like ChatGPT and enjoy working in an environment where GitHub Co-Pilot is provided as part of your development toolkit.

- **Develop and Maintain the Viewer:** 
    Build an interactive 2D/3D viewer that renders 2D(SVG) / 3D files, supports zoom, pan, and element selection, and integrates additional metadata overlays.
- **API Integration:** 
    Implement client-side communication with server-side RESTful APIs to fetch property data and manage user comments. Ensure robust error handling and data synchronization.   
- **User Interface & UX:** 
    Design and develop a clean, intuitive UI that allows users to interact with 2D(SVG)/3D elements. Collaborate with the UX/UI team to refine user interactions and ensure the best possible user experience.
- **Performance Optimization:**

- **Utilize AI Tools:**

    Write unit tests and participate in code reviews. Debug and resolve issues related to API integration and UI responsiveness.
- **Collaboration:**

listJob.description:
About Global Fashion Group
Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across LATAM, SEA and ANZ. From our people to our customers and partners, we exist to empower everyone to express their true selves through fashion. Our three e-commerce platforms: Dafiti, ZALORA and THE ICONIC connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to over 800 million consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. GFG’s platforms provide seamless and inspiring customer experiences from discovery to delivery, powered by art & science that is infused with unparalleled local knowledge. As part of the Group’s vision is to be the #1 online destination for fashion & lifestyle in growth markets, we are committed to doing this responsibly by being people and planet positive across everything we do.
THE TEAM
At THE ICONIC, innovation drives us; we believe that innovation should not be sitting in a siloed team but rather be part of everyone and everything we do & deliver. Every person in tech has a voice and we find that our best products are achieved through collaboration (usually over a coffee in front of a whiteboard).
We have over 120 people in tech, not to mention 45 nationalities (and counting!) This means that our skills and experience are diverse, allowing for greater collaboration and constant learning. All of our teams are cross-functional, mission-driven and able to iterate from inception to production (DevOps mentality) without being blocked or having to ask permission from other teams. We love to move fast and validate learning using data (lucky for us our Data Science & Analytics team is also world-class!)
SCOPE OF ROLE
You will be working in an agile environment on enterprise-level, high-quality software and infrastructure to support THE ICONIC as a contributor to native mobile technologies and efforts in the online retail space.
Our team builds and operates The ICONIC iOS app, and continuously pushes for innovations and best customer experiences.

Excellent written and oral communication skills
Ability to clearly articulate complex architectural and technical problems
Ability to apply agile methodologies when it comes to lean software development
3+ year experience developing native iOS app with Swift
Proficient with SwiftUI and Combine
Demonstrated ability to lead a team
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with maintaining CI and managing app releases
NICE TO HAVE
Knowledge and experience building mobile design systems
Experience with test automation

Mục tiêu chính: Thiết kế, phát triển và duy trì cả giao diện người dùng (frontend) và backend của các ứng dụng phần mềm, đảm bảo tính ổn định và hiệu suất của hệ thống, từ giai đoạn lên ý tưởng đến khi triển khai và bảo trì.
Trách nhiệm chính:
Phát triển frontend:
Thiết kế và triển khai giao diện người dùng trực quan và thân thiện cho các ứng dụng web và di động.
Sử dụng các công nghệ như HTML, CSS, JavaScript và các framework như React.js, Angular hoặc Vue.js để phát triển các thành phần frontend.
Tối ưu hóa trải nghiệm người dùng (UI/UX) trên nhiều thiết bị và trình duyệt khác nhau.
Phát triển backend:
Thiết kế và triển khai các API và dịch vụ backend, đảm bảo hệ thống có khả năng mở rộng, bảo mật và tối ưu hóa hiệu suất.
Sử dụng các ngôn ngữ lập trình như Node.js, Python, Java, hoặc PHP để phát triển backend.
Quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu, xây dựng và duy trì các hệ thống quản lý dữ liệu (SQL và NoSQL).
Tích hợp hệ thống:
Xây dựng các giải pháp tích hợp giữa frontend và backend, đảm bảo luồng dữ liệu được kết nối và hoạt động mượt mà.
Làm việc với các API bên ngoài và tích hợp các dịch vụ của bên thứ ba khi cần thiết.
Đảm bảo chất lượng mã nguồn:
Tuân thủ các quy tắc phát triển phần mềm và tiêu chuẩn mã nguồn để đảm bảo tính bảo mật và hiệu suất của ứng dụng.
Thực hiện các quy trình kiểm thử (unit testing, integration testing) để phát hiện và khắc phục lỗi kịp thời.
Phối hợp nhóm:
Làm việc chặt chẽ với các nhóm thiết kế, DevOps, QA và các bộ phận liên quan để đảm bảo sản phẩm được phát triển theo đúng yêu cầu và chất lượng.
Tham gia vào quy trình Agile/Scrum, cập nhật tiến độ công việc và đóng góp vào các cuộc họp hàng ngày, sprint review và retrospectives.
Bảo trì và nâng cấp hệ thống:
Bảo trì và cập nhật các hệ thống hiện có, khắc phục sự cố và tối ưu hóa hiệu suất khi cần thiết.
Đưa ra các đề xuất cải tiến về mặt công nghệ và tính năng để nâng cao trải nghiệm người dùng.
listJob.jobExperience:
Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Kỹ thuật phần mềm hoặc các ngành liên quan.
Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiểu 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển các ứng dụng web fullstack.
Kỹ năng:
Thành thạo các ngôn ngữ lập trình frontend như HTML, CSS, JavaScript, và các framework phổ biến như React, Angular, hoặc Vue.js.
Kinh nghiệm với các ngôn ngữ backend như Node.js, Python, PHP hoặc Java.
Kỹ năng quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu, bao gồm cả SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) và NoSQL (MongoDB).
Hiểu biết về kiến trúc phần mềm, bảo mật và tối ưu hóa hệ thống.
Kinh nghiệm với các công cụ quản lý mã nguồn như Git và các quy trình CI/CD.
Có khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và tư duy logic tốt.
Ưu tiên:
Kinh nghiệm làm việc trong môi trường Agile/Scrum.
Hiểu biết về các công cụ và dịch vụ đám mây (Cloud) như AWS, Google Cloud, Azure.
Kinh nghiệm với Docker, Kubernetes là một lợi thế.
 *** Vị trí Dev Fullstack tại Conek Telecom yêu cầu ứng viên có kiến thức và kỹ năng toàn diện về cả frontend và backend, cùng khả năng làm việc linh hoạt và đáp ứng nhanh chóng các yêu cầu phát triển phần mềm.
listJob.privilege:

listJob.description:
About us
The Data & Technology Team within the Strategy & Innovation Office will leverage technology and data to help our business create and innovate. We are looking for a data science leader who is obsessed about bridging between data and decision-making. This role will be responsible for the build, scale and shape the direction of our business through data science & analytics. The ideal candidate is "full-stack" data powerhouse who uses data to guide decision making to ensure the best experiences. This role will report to the Data Scientist Manager .
 1. 6 Month Expectations
Support Technology and Product Management team in mapping out the data vision and future state data pipeline and architecture
Translate business questions and concerns into specific analytical questions that can be answered with available data using statistical and machine learning methods
Provide feedback to our science and engineering teams on the applicability of technical solutions from the business perspective
Solve real-world problems by getting and analyzing large amounts of data, diving deep to identify business insights and opportunities, designing simulations and experiments, developing statistical and ML models tailored to business needs, and collaborating with Scientists, Engineers, BIEs, and Product Team.
Develop statistical and analytic models to uncover insights and segmentations that drive the business forward and uncover new areas of opportunities
Apply machine learning methodologies by developing new sources, developing and testing enhancements, running computational experiments, and fine-tuning parameters for new ones
Write code (Python, Scala, SQL, etc.) to obtain, manipulate, and analyze data
2. 12+ Month Expectations
Build decision-making models and propose solutions for the business problem you define
Formalize assumptions about how our systems are expected to work, create statistical definition of the outlier, and develop methods to systematically identify outliers. Work out why such examples are outliers and define if any actions are needed.
Given anecdotes about anomalies or using automatic scripts to define anomalies, deep dive to explain why they happen, and identify fixes
Drive implementation forward while enabling the business scaling vectors
Develop scalable data pipelines to support analytics needs
Communicate verbally and in writing to business customers with various levels of technical knowledge, educating them about our research, as well as sharing insights and recommendations
Build and lead a team of data scientists and analysts to develop AI, ML and other algorithmic solutions to automate tasks and generate insights
